name: Save Jelly
description: During the hurricane, were destroyed crossings between Jelly and their children. Now little Jelly completely alone surrounded by a huge number of dangers that come both from water and from the air. Protect children Jelly from giant bats, and strive to drag them into his cave. Watch for sea and timely slugify shark until she savoured the defenseless kids. Solve the puzzle and match in color all Jelly between them. The type of bridge should match the color of Jelly. Bridges can't be crossed among themselves.
